english: What is the illiteracy rate in Egypt?
when I was in elementary school, ...
Her son is in first grade.
I’m studying Arabic at a language academy in Cairo.
transliteration: ʔána bádris 3árabi fi ʔakadimíyyit ilʔálsun f- ilqāhíra.
arabic: أنا بدْرِس عربي في أكاديميةْ الألْسُن في القاهِرة.

english: in one’s second year of middle school
in one’s third year of high school
in one’s final year of high school
I have six classes a day.
Class starts at 8 o'clock and finishes at 9 o'clock.
transliteration: ilɧíȿȿa btíbdaʔ issā3a tamánya wi tíxlaȿ tís3a.
arabic: الحِصّة بْتِبْدأ السّاعة تمانْيَة و تِخْلص تِسْعة.

english: to ask a question in class
Copy these sentences into your notebook.
We have a fifteen-minute break between classes.
arabic: عنْدنا فُسْحة رُبْع ساعة بيْن الحِصص.

english: He needs to study for the test.
The students have to write an essay about a historical event.
transliteration: iʈʈálaba -lmafrūɖ yiktíbu mawɖū3 ta3bīr 3an ɧádas tarīxi.
arabic: الطّلبُه المفْروض يِكْتِبوا مَوْضوع تعْبير عن حدث تاريخي.

english: I intend to enroll in an Arabic class next month.
transliteration: nāwi ʔaštírik fi faȿl il3árabi -ššahr ilgáyy.
arabic: ناوي أشْترِك في فصْل العربي الشّهْر الجايّ.

english: to get into college, start university
to get into college, start university
I got into the faculty of medicine, but later I changed to law.
transliteration: daxáltə kullíyyit iʈʈíbb, bassə sibtáha wi daxáltə ɧuʔūʔ.
arabic: دخلْت كُلّيةْ الطِّبّ، بسّ سِبْتها و دخلْت حُقوق.

english: When did you graduate from university?

transliteration: itxarrágtə min ilgám3a sánit ʔalfēn wi xámsa.
arabic: اِتْخرّجْت مِن الجامْعة سنِةْ ألْفيْن و خمْسة.

english: All the freshmen have to attend an orientation ceremony.
arabic: كُلّ الطُّلّاب الجُداد المفْروض يِحْضروا المحاضْرة التّعْريفية.

english: He got a certificate for completing the course.
What was your favorite subject in school?
transliteration: ʔē ʔáktar mádda kuntə bitɧibbáha fi -lmadrása?
arabic: أيْه أكْتر مادّة كُنْت بِتْحِبّها في المدْرسة؟

english: I really enjoyed studying history, but I hated science class.
I really enjoyed studying history, but I hated science class.
transliteration: kuntə baɧíbb ittarīx bassə bákrah il3ulūm.
arabic: كُنْت بحِبّ التّاريخ بسّ بكْرهْ العُلوم.
